verses.roman:
"sannyāsīra dharma nahe 'indriya-tarpaṇa'
yaiche taiche kare mātra udara bharaṇa

synonyms: sannyāsīra—of a sannyāsī; dharma—religious principle; nahe—is not; indriya-tarpaṇa—to gratify the senses; yaiche taiche—some way or other; kare—does; mātra—only; udara bharaṇa—filling the belly.
translation: Rāmacandra Purī advised, "It is not the business of a sannyāsī to gratify his senses. He should fill his belly some way or other.
